en.banner_brief_mobile: UOS seamlessly integrates with other platform services.
en.banner_describe: UOS not only supports OpenStack core IaaS services, but also with Hadoop large data ecosystem and Cloud Foundary PaaS.
en.feature_four_intro: Seconds deployment, online migration, VNC management.
en.feature_one_intro: Isolated two-tier virtual network, router port mapping.
en.feature_three_intro: Massive data, support for multiple access protocols.
en.feature_two_intro: Stable I / O performance, customer service spikes.
en.show_one_introduction: Optimize the cloud platform architecture and core components, to provide high-performance cloud services.
en.show_three_introduction: Computing resources, storage resources, network resources easily expanded.
en.show_two_introduction: Full platform HA program to protect the business continuity and stability.
en.solve_four_introduction: UOS enterprise not only provides IaaS platform, but also the integration of a variety of PaaS platform to address the needs of customer business level.
en.solve_one_introduction: So that the private data center has a large public cloud capacity, so you have 7x24 hours of o&m, distributed architecture experience.
en.solve_two_introduction: Provide long-term support and maintenance, continuous repair community potential function, to protect the stability of the product.
en.solve_three_introduction: Based on the OpenStack community Newton version, 100% is compatible with community APIs to avoid vendor lockout.
en.tip: （this is the thumbnail, click on view a larger version）
en.title: UnitedStack - UOS Enterprise

zh.banner_brief_mobile: UOS 与其他平台服务做无缝整合。
zh.banner_describe: UOS 不仅支持 OpenStack 核心 IaaS 服务，同时还作为一个整合平台，能够与包含 Hadoop 大数据生态和 Cloud Foundary PaaS 等在内的平台服务做无缝整合。
zh.feature_four_intro: 秒级部署，在线迁移，VNC 管理，多 Hypervisor 支持。
zh.feature_one_intro: 完全隔离的二层虚拟网络，路由器端口映射，支持防火墙，负载均衡等。
zh.feature_three_intro: 海量数据，弹性扩容，支持多种访问协议。
zh.feature_two_intro: 稳定的I/O表现，客服业务尖峰，高性能、SLA 保证，秒级备份恢复。
zh.show_one_introduction: 优化云平台架构与核心组件，提供高性能云服务。
zh.show_three_introduction: 计算资源，存储资源，网络资源轻松扩展。
zh.show_two_introduction: 全平台 HA 方案，保障业务连续稳定。
zh.solve_four_introduction: UOS Enterprise 不仅仅提供 IaaS 平台，还融合多种 PaaS 平台，解决客户业务层面的需求。
zh.solve_one_introduction: 使私有数据中心拥有大型公有云的能力，使您拥有7x24小时运维，分布式架构和高效与透明的上云体验。
zh.solve_two_introduction: 提供长期的支持和维护，持续修复社区潜在功能，性能缺陷，保障产品的稳定、可扩展性。
zh.solve_three_introduction: 基于 OpenStack 社区 Newton 版本，100%与社区API兼容，避免厂商锁定。
zh.title: UnitedStack - UOS Enterprise
